fit.description: 📐 FIT: Resizes to fit dimensions, adds black bars if needed (preserves aspect ratio)

pad.description: 📏 PAD: Smart padding with auto background color (preserves aspect ratio)

scale.description: 📈 SCALE: Scales to exact dimensions (may distort aspect ratio)

auto.description: 🤖 AUTO: Smart auto-crop from center (may crop some content)

recommendation: Use 'fit' mode for best quality without cropping
